meanings.definition: A woman who is a nabob or who possesses great wealth or power.
meanings.sent1: The nabobesses in the town were known for their luxurious lifestyles.
meanings.sent2: The group of wealthy nabobesses attended the charity gala.
meanings.sent3: The nabobesses decided to have a fancy tea party to show off their riches.
meanings.sent4: She ruled over the social scene like a queen among nabobesses.
meanings.sent5: The image of the elegant nabobesses in their grand mansion stayed in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with vendors selling various nabobesses.
meanings.sent2: The collection included rare coins and ancient nabobesses.
meanings.sent3: The children played with the colorful nabobesses in the sandbox.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sweet scent of the fresh nabobesses.
meanings.sent5: She admired the intricate details on the delicate nabobesses.
